entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It is mentioned as the whole table leaned forward to watch the owls land.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is present at the scene where the owls are landing. He asks 'What's going on?' in amazement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's who is present at the scene. She breathlessly pulls out a screec h owl bearing a package and suggests opening it first.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who receives the owls. He rips off the packaging to reveal a copy of The Quibbler.

entities.name: the quibbler
entities.description: The Quibbler is a magazine that Harry receives in one of the packages. It is mentioned as March's edition.

relationships.description: Harry received The Quibbler in one of the owl packages.
Hermione pulled out an owl bearing a package from the feathery mass.
Ron was part of the Gryffindor table that leaned forward to watch the owls land.
